Sentencas: 3YSZ specimens with variable open porosity (1-57%) were fabricated, and the stiffness, strength and fracture properties (fracture toughness and R-curve) were measured to investigate their potential use as support structures for solid oxide fuel or electrolysis cells.
Titulo: Influence of porosity on mechanical properties of tetragonal stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: The ball-on-ring test was used to characterize Young's modulus and Weibull strength.
Titulo: Influence of porosity on mechanical properties of tetragonal stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: The variation of fracture toughness with porosity was investigated and modelled using the results from fracture mechanical testing.
Titulo: Influence of porosity on mechanical properties of tetragonal stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: A distinct R-curve behaviour was observed in dense 3YSZ specimens, in samples with a porosity around 15% and in some of the highly porous samples (porosities similar to 45%) reflecting a transformation toughening in the material.
Titulo: Influence of porosity on mechanical properties of tetragonal stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: For the most porous samples, the R-curve behaviour disappeared and subcritical crack growth was observed.
Titulo: Influence of porosity on mechanical properties of tetragonal stabilized zirconia

Sentencas: The studies indicate that even highly porous 3YSZ structures (porosities exceeding 40%) are feasible supports for SOFC/SOECs from a mechanical point of view.
Titulo: Influence of porosity on mechanical properties of tetragonal stabilized zirconia
